channel.title: Weird Server Error?
channel.description:
[b]EDIT: I HAVE FIXED THE ERROR, FOR ANY ONE THAT NEED'S THE ANSWER TO THIS ITS BECAUSE WHEN I USED THE TUTORIAL, THE FORUMS I WAS USING REPLACES TABS WITH SPACES, SO I HAD TO REPLACE ALL THE SPACES WITH TABS IN MY .CFG FILES.[/b]
Hey, i used a Castle wars Tutorial off a different website, that works, I'm using delta, and i got this error: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "5 34 2444 3086 0 0 0 0 0 1" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2068) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:592) at server.main(server.java:129) Haterz-PVP.[/code]Does any one know how to fix this? the compile has [b]NO[/b] errors.

item.title: Weird Server Error?
item.dc:creator: @strn00b strn00b
item.description:
@strn00b wrote:

nah, i fixed it, it was becuase the forums that i copied it off of, replaced tabs with spaces, and in .cfg you always need to use tabs for that stuff, so i had to go trough replacing the spaces with lines lol.

Read full topic

mages pk god:

lol invalid number according to java… make it a different number

Lol what?

just re download or if you made a backup, replace it.

item.title: Weird Server Error?
item.dc:creator: @strn00b strn00b
item.description:
@strn00b wrote:

EDIT: I HAVE FIXED THE ERROR, FOR ANY ONE THAT NEED’S THE ANSWER TO THIS ITS BECAUSE WHEN I USED THE TUTORIAL, THE FORUMS I WAS USING REPLACES TABS WITH SPACES, SO I HAD TO REPLACE ALL THE SPACES WITH TABS IN MY .CFG FILES.

Hey, i used a Castle wars Tutorial off a different website, that works, I’m using delta, and
i got this error:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "5 34 2444 3086 0 0 0 0 0 1" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2068) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:592) at server.main(server.java:129) Haterz-PVP.Does any one know how to fix this? the compile has NO errors.

Read full topic
